subject: p18224196
Findings: In comparison with the study of, the intestinal catheter has been removed. The right PICC line again extends to the lower portion of the SVC. Continued bilateral basilar opacification is consistent with substantial effusions, more prominent on the left, and underlying compressive atelectasis. Moderate cardiomegaly persists. No definite vascular congestion.
